root.para: . The determination of fair value at the date of reclassification may not conform with the guidance in FASB ASC 320, including the guidance on evaluating other-than-temporary impairments. Improper determination of fair value

para.emphasis: . The determination of fair value at the date of reclassification may not conform with the guidance in FASB ASC 320 and FASB ASC 326-20. Improper determination of fair value
